channel.title: Continuous woodcutting

item.title: Continuous woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Using this:

if(hasAxe() == true) { cutTimer = 3; startAnimation(2846); addItem(1511, 1); addSkillXP(35, 8); sendMessage("You get some logs."); } if(!hasAxe()) { sendMessage("You need an axe to cut this tree."); } }

(Clearly some things will have to go; I get that) How would I make it so the character kept cutting? While loop fail, since that checks every like .000000000000000000000000000000001 seconds. I just need it to be redone every couple seconds. Any thoughts at all?

Thanks.

Read full topic
